name: Duizend Bookmarks
description: Display the bookmarks you want on the new tab page
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3000 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src http://localhost:3000; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' chrome://favicon/ data:;
